Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protect. Dist. No. Sixteen -- 11.32 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. Sixteen Proposition

Summary:  Authority for Fire Protection District No. Sixteen to collect, for 10 years, a tax of eleven and thirty-two hundredths mills per annum for the purpose of operating and maintaining the district's fire protection facilities, purchasing fire trucks and other fire fighting equipment; paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for fire hydrant rentals and service and paying the cost of acquiring, improving or constructing fire protection facilities of the district, constituting works of public improvement, title to which shall be in the public.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. Sixteen of the Parish of Cameron, be authorized to levy a tax of eleven and thirty-two hundredths (11.32) mills on the dollar of assessed valuation on all property subject to taxation in said district (an estimated $59,031 reasonably expected to be collected per annum), for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2011, for the purposes of operating and maintaining the district's fire protection facilities, purchasing fire trucks and other fire fighting equipment; paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for fire hydrant rentals and service and paying the cost of acquiring, improving or constructing fire protection facilities of the district, constituting works of public improvement, title to which shall be in the public?

Race.SpecificTitle: Gravity Drain. Dist. No. Seven -- 4.66 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Gravity Drainage District No. Seven Proposition

Summary:  Authority for Gravity Drainage District No. Seven to collect, for 10 years, a tax of four and sixty-six hundredths mills per annum on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $345,832 reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of this tax per annum) for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining drainage operations within and for said District.
Race.FullText: Shall Gravity Drainage District No. Seven of the Parish of Cameron, be authorized to levy a tax of four and sixty-six hundredths (4.66) mills on the dollar of assessed valuation on all property subject to taxation in said District, (an estimated $345,832 reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of this tax per annum) for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2011, for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining said District's drainage systems constituting works of public improvements, title to which shall be in the public within and for said District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Hackberry Recreation District -- 10.33 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Hackberry Recreation District Proposition

Summary:   Authority for Hackberry Recreation District to collect for 10 years, a tax of ten and thirty-three hundredths mills per annum on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $289,405 reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of this tax per annum) for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining said District's recreation facilities within and for said District.
Race.FullText: Shall Hackberry Recreation District of the Parish of Cameron be authorized to levy a tax of Ten and Thirty-three (10.33) mills on the dollar of assessed valuation on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $289,405 reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of this tax per annum) for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2011, for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining said District's recreation facilities within and for said District?
